title: Freshers help!
content: I have not yet received any mail regarding classes starting from tomorrow. When asked at the office, ( 3 days back ) they said it would begin on 28th ( didn't seem definitive tho). What should I do now ?

comments.body: I got my mail at 5:30 the previous day for round 1 so check again. If not just call and ask tommo
Yes, i too got an email from PES on 6th November that my classes start on 7th November. Don't worry, you too will get. I was also planning to ask them but the email came the very day.
Welcome to PES, you'll be informed a day before reporting.
